pages.text: This entry will go through all resource packs and optional mods which are enabled by default.$(br2)If you notice something missing here, please report it on the $(l:https://github.com/kleinbox/Create-Fresh-Start/issues)GitHub Issue Tracker$(/l)!

pages.title: Outline Shader
pages.text: $(bold)$(l:https://modrinth.com/resourcepack/outline-shader)Outline Shader$() is a resource pack that is making use of vanilla core shaders $(italic)(graphics settings must be set to $(bold)Fabolous$()$(italic) in order for this to work)$()$(br2)It basically adds the Minecraft YouTube thumbnail outlines. Some hate 'em, some love 'em.$(br2)This can be disabled under $(8)$(bold)Settings → Resource Packs$().
Here are a few examples how they should look when enabled.

pages.title: Just Expressions
pages.text: $(bold)$(l:https://modrinth.com/resourcepack/just-expressions)Just Expressions$() applies the Fresh Animations eyes to players as well.$(br2)In order for a player to have these eyes, they need to prepare their skin. This does not affect how the skin is being seen outside of this resource pack.$(br2)Can be disabled under $(8)$(bold)Settings → Resource Packs$().
Here is my skin with and without the resource pack.

pages.title: 1.21.2 Redstone
pages.text: This resource pack backports the Redstone Torch changes from 1.21.2 and newer.$(br2)This can be disabled under $(8)$(bold)Settings → Resource Packs$().
Redstone with vs. without the 1.21.2 changes.

pages.title: Fresh Animations
pages.text: $(bold)$(l:https://modrinth.com/resourcepack/fresh-animations)Fresh Animations$() $(italic)completely$() changes animations for almost all entities with $(bold)$(l:https://modrinth.com/resourcepack/fresh-animations-extensions)FA - Extensions$() adding more details to them.$(br2)Both can be disabled under $(8)$(bold)Settings → Resource Packs$().
Here is my skin with and without the resource pack.

pages.title: Better Clouds
pages.text: $(bold)$(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/better-clouds)Better Clouds$() is a mod that replaces the vanilla clouds, making them look less flat.$(br2)It can be disabled under $(8)$(bold)Mods → Better Clouds → Configure → Enabled$().
Here is how the sky looks with and without the mod enabled.

pages.title: Fog
pages.text: $(bold)$(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/fog)Fog$() is a mod that replaces the vanilla fog behaviour.$(br2)Different to other fog mods, instead of just disabling the fog, it enhances it for a better mood!$(br2)It can be disabled under $(8)$(bold)Mods → Fog → Configure → General Settings → Disable Mod Entirely$().
Here is how landscapes look with and without the mod enabled.
